    Contact Us

    Contact Us

    We are recruiting for only Ph.D Students, Integrated M.S.-Ph.D. Students, and Research Interns.

    • E-mail: chanwcom@korea.ac.kr (Professor)
    • E-mail: kahk000@korea.ac.kr (Student)
    • Phone: +82 10-6721-7301 (Student)
    • Address: 145 Anam-ro, College of Science Annex Room #108, Seongbuk-gu, Seoul, Korea, 02841
    01
    Document Submission

    Please submit your application documents via email.
    02
    Interview with Professor

    Applicants who pass the document screening will have an interview with the professor.
    03
    Apply to Korea University

    After the interview with the professor, please apply for admission to Korea University.
    04
    Welcome to SLP Lab

    If you pass Step 3, you will become a member of the research lab.
